sections.PURPOSE:
Introduce concepts of urban operations at the Squad and Platoon level. Develop Squad and Platoon SOPs for urban operations, react to UAS, BD6.
Key Training Objectives: Battle Drill 6
Movement in Urban Terrain
Urban CCP/CASEVAC
React to UAS
sections.KEY TASKS: include: ammo P/U, clearance of the range, day 0 weapons mx, SI inventory, day 0 recovery

sections.MISSION:
Comanche Troop, 1st Squadron, 2CR conducts Squad and Platoon Situational Training Exercises at the Urban Ops Site from 29APR24 to 01MAY24 IOT increase the lethality and cohesion of the Troop and maintain proficiency.
